appDesc.message: Marks content farm links and prevents the user from entering by accident

blockTab.message: Blacklist the domain of this tab
blockTab.description: Label of context menu blocker on tab

blockPage.message: Blacklist the domain of this page
blockPage.description: Label of context menu blocker on page

blockLink.message: Blacklist the domain of this link
blockLink.description: Label of context menu blocker on link

blockSelection.message: Blacklist the domain of selected text
blockSelection.description: Label of context menu blocker on selection

blockDomain.description: Prompt message of context menu blocker

viewBlockedFrame.description: Text of link of a blocked frame page

body.message: Continue? Back if you are annoyed with them.

details.description: Label of details button in blocked page

detailsTitle.message: Enter the options page to revise blocklists.
detailsTitle.description: Title of details button in blocked page

backBtn.description: Label of back button in blocked page

backBtnTitle.message: Go back to the previous page. Keep away from spams!
backBtnTitle.description: Title of back button in blocked page

viewBtn.description: Label of view button in blocked page

viewBtnTitle.message: View processed web page content with images, multimedia, and embedded scripts removed. This brings NO ads traffic to the site.
viewBtnTitle.description: Title of view button in blocked page

markTitle.message: This link targets a content farm
markTitle.description: Title and alt text for the image marker of a link targeting a content farm page.

allBlacklist.description: Label of allBlacklist field in options page

allBlacklistDesc.description: Description of allBlacklist field in options page

webBlacklists.description: Label of webBlacklists field in options page

webBlacklistsDesc.message: URLs of web blacklists that will be automatically fetched and imported. One entry per line. Text following a space will be ignored.
webBlacklistsDesc.description: Description of webBlacklists field in options page

webBlacklistsPlaceholder.description: Placeholder of webBlacklists field in options page

userBlacklist.description: Label of userBlacklist field in options page

userBlacklistDesc.message: Additional blacklist. One entry per line. Domain and all subdomains are matched. A wildcard (*) matches zero or more chars. Text following a space will be ignored. URLs will be auto-corrected.
userBlacklistDesc.description: Description of userBlacklist field in options page

userBlacklistPlaceholder.description: Placeholder of userBlacklist field in options page

userWhitelist.description: Label of userWhitelist field in options page

userWhitelistDesc.message: List of sites to be unblocked. One entry per line. Domain and all subdomains are matched. A wildcard (*) matches zero or more chars. Text following a space will be ignored. URLs will be auto-corrected.
userWhitelistDesc.description: Description of userWhitelist field in options page

userWhitelistPlaceholder.description: Placeholder of userWhitelist field in options page

showContextMenuCommands.description: Label of showContextMenuCommands in options page

report.description: Label of report button in options page

reportUrl.description: Target URL of report button in options page

save.description: Label of save button in options page

reset.description: Label of reset button in options page
